actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans

official_title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from authorizing commercial finfish aquaculture operations in the Exclusive Economic Zone.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior, notwithstanding any other provision of law, from issuing any permit or in any other way authorizing any person to conduct commercial finfish aquaculture operations in the U.S. Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ).

titles.title: To prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from authorizing commercial finfish aquaculture operations in the Exclusive Economic Zone.
